snippet: The United States will play Canada in a home-and-away series in August that will send one of them to the 2015 Rugby World Cup.
lead_paragraph: The United States will play Canada in a home-and-away series in August that will send one of them to the 2015 Rugby World Cup.

headline.seo: U.S. to Play Canada for Trip to Rugby World Cup
headline.main: U.S. to Play Canada for Trip to Rugby World Cup
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Play Canada for Trip to World Cup
